title: What is ClIF.ai?
body: A career management software using AI to help individuals upskill, land career opportunities, and achieve career wellness.

title: How does the membership work?
body: Pay yearly and access all resources.

title: How to reach CLIF ai?.
body: You can reach us anytime at info@clif.ai.

title: Which industries do you focus on?
body: We focus on technology, content creation, small business, and equity.

title: Where should I start first?
body: You should start with our CLIF Playbook that provides step by step guidance.

title: Where can I find reviews?
body: Our testimonials can be found on the home page.

title: Do I have to complete all the steps?
body: We recommend completing all the steps for higher success rates, but you don't have to.

title: Which path in tech should I work in?
How long are the interactive learning modules?
Is a job guaranteed?
body: If you follow each step then yes!

title: Can I reach out to team leads anytime?
body: Yes we have an open schedule available anytime to meet with you!

title: Did you follow us on linkedin and instagram?
body: Yay! Send us an email so we can give you a discount.
